text: Jitsuni ware wa meishō o sazukete shito-tachi o tsukawashi, mata kare-ra to issho ni, Keisuke to (seija no) hakari o kudashita. Sore wa hitobito ga seigi o okonau tamedearu. Mata ware wa tetsu o kudashita. Soreni wa idaina chikara ga ari, mata ningen no tame ni shuju no ben'eki o kyōsuru. Sore wa arrā ga, mitsu ni kare o tasukeru mono, mata shito-tachi o tasukeru mono o, shitte ora reru tamedearu. Hontōni arrā wa kyōdai ni shite iryoku narabinaki hō de ara reru
